attributes.action: Remove Prince William from the Bar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prince William was recently called to the Bar, without having obtained the qualifications or experience necessary for others to be called to the Bar.  We the undersigned therefore request the Prime Minister remove Prince William from the Bar until he obtains the necessary qualifications and experience.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
